situation: I am always depressed and the upcoming holidays are making it a lot worse.

dialog.text: Hello. How are you today?
dialog.speaker: sys

dialog.text: hi i am okay, a little bit sad though
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] sad [xIntent] none [xWant] to cry [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Okay. I am very sorry to hear that! Do you want to tell me more about that?
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Depressed [str] sadness, fine, sad, normal, angry [aff] Sad

dialog.text: Well with the holidays coming up i have been very stressed and nervous about what i am going to do
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] nervous [xIntent] none [xWant] to relax [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: I really feel you there. Holidays are so hard.. especially with the way this year has been. Anything specific?
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Relax and enjoy. [str] calm, correct, enery, longtime, feelin [aff] Anxious

dialog.text: Yes. I am a college student and I live on campus. The day before I moved in my dad said some unforgivable things to me and we haven't spoke since
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] ashamed [xIntent] to be mean [xWant] move on [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: I have no choice but to go live at home over the break but I am very scared about it
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] worried [xIntent] none [xWant] to stay home [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Do you feel scared for your own self? Or of the situation in general? I'm sorry to hear that. Relationships with parents can be very difficult sometimes.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] I want you to survive. [str] commit, killing, death, painless, option [aff] Afraid

dialog.text: I'm around college age as well and also live at home. So I can understand your struggle.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] I want you to survive. [str] commit, killing, death, painless, option [aff] Afraid

dialog.text: more for the situation in general. i know we will not speak but we will constantly be running into each other, my house is not big.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] nervous [xIntent] none [xWant] i do n't like to be around people [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: and i have no car to escape it
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] sad [xIntent] none [xWant] to get a new car [xNeed] none [xEffect] gets arrested

dialog.text: It's like we live the same life. I also have no car to escape! It seems so small, but it's such a huge stressor when you feel trapped in an environment you're not positive in. I feel your pain and I empathize with you completely.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] And it never gets easy. [str] posting, pointless, ripped, passion, goal [aff] Sad

dialog.text: It'll be hard but I hope you can make it through it throughout the holidays and enjoy yourself some. Are there any pros to going back home? Any pets?
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] And it never gets easy. [str] posting, pointless, ripped, passion, goal [aff] Sad

dialog.text: Thank you I appreciate that. I will be fine making it over the thanksgiving break but I am more nervous about covid-19 sending us home for good.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] nervous [xIntent] none [xWant] to be a good leader [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Not many to be honest. I have a hamster but he is at school with me so nothing at home to go back to
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] bored [xIntent] none [xWant] to do something else [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: It sounds like Covid- 19 is going to be a personal stressor for you. It's such a strange thing to have to live with already, the pandemic, and i'm sorry that it might end up pushing you where you don't want to be.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] ), I'm here. [str] purpose, change, gets, future, offer [aff] Lonely

dialog.text: Could you bring your hamster home with you? Even the smallest things could help a place feel more loving
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] ), I'm here. [str] purpose, change, gets, future, offer [aff] Lonely

dialog.text: Yes it is very strange and I know that it is a big stressor on all of us, i don't want to sound selfish.
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] guilty [xIntent] none [xWant] to be a good person [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Yes i am bringing him home with me so that is my little piece of joy that is coming along
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] to be with me [xWant] to have a good time [xNeed] to have a baby [xEffect] none

dialog.text: I don't think you're selfish at all. You have feelings you are entitled to have and are expressing them which is healthy and I encourage that behavior!
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] happy enough to find life worth living [str] worth, purpose, living, meaning, happiness [aff] Joyful

dialog.text: Good! I know how hard this situation can be. Very nerve wracking. The smallest things, even a hamster, can be so beneficial.
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] happy enough to find life worth living [str] worth, purpose, living, meaning, happiness [aff] Joyful

dialog.text: Well thank you that does help me to feel better. Yes I am happy to bring him home with me and hoping I can have my niece over to intro duce her to him
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] to have fun [xWant] to have fun [xNeed] to have a baby [xEffect] none

dialog.text: You sound like a very determined person in making this trip as stress free as possible. I commend you for that! Maybe you could have your niece over often to play with your hamster just to soften the stress of being there
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] To love someone. [str] chore, video, shuffling, games, playing [aff] Sad

dialog.text: It is surely my goal! I appreciate your kind words. I would love that if I had a car I could do that but I am not sure how much she will be able to come to my house. I am going to try though!
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] to be there [xWant] to be there [xNeed] to make plans [xEffect] to see me

dialog.text: Is Uber an option for you? I know there's a lot of rideshare services but they're not always financially reasonable. But that could be a way to get away if you ever need too!
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] What do you want out of life? [str] purpose, hobbies, hobby, meaning, consiousness [aff] Hopeful

dialog.text: that is very true i didn't even think of that to be honest! I may use that along the way, thank you for the reminder!
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] good [xIntent] to be honest [xWant] to be honest [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Sometimes I forget little things like that to help myself whenever I get too involved in the emotional aspect of things. I'm glad I could suggest it to you!
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] Honestly? [str] happiness, remember, forgot, genuinely, happy [aff] Hopeful

dialog.text: Thank you! Well i appreciate your help a lot and hope you have a great day!
dialog.speaker: usr
dialog.knowledge: [xReact] happy [xIntent] none [xWant] to do well [xNeed] none [xEffect] none

dialog.text: Of course! I hope you do as well and happy holidays!
dialog.speaker: sys
dialog.heal: [resp] happy enough to find life worth living [str] commit, killing, death, painless, option [aff] Joyful
